content:
I think this is a pretty amazing DIY idea, and I love that you can use the sweatshirt as clothing OR as the laptop carrier, so it's doubly useful. This could be a lifesaver if you're caught in the rain without adequate protection for your laptop, or if you need to hop on a bike.Â 
This is one of those ideas that makes me think: Why didn't I think of that? Original graphic below via The Trendy Girl.
title: Turn a hoodie into a laptop carrier -- no cutting or sewing required
